english.segment1: One chance for singing. To lose ourselves in such a simple melody. One love worth saving. Is worth a million troubles if we make it.
english.segment2: [Chorus]. New York, can't find me. New York, New York
english.segment3: One life worth living. Could save us all or lose its way completely. It's allright, if it's OK. To find a little peace of mind and hope it stays
english.segment4: New York, has her timing. New York, New York
english.segment5: Empty ourselves in this city. Spend every wish on the way. It leaves you with nothing to swing from. But it's all right
